outline:
1. perfect, complete
    1. complete, perfect
      1. one who lacks nothing in physical strength, beauty, etc
    2. sound, wholesome
      1. an ordinary, quiet sort of person
    3. complete, morally innocent, having integrity
      1. one who is morally and ethically pure
kjv_def: coupled together, perfect, plain, undefiled, upright.
strongs_def: complete; usually (morally) pious; specifically, gentle, dear
